alert.note: Alert for Lower Washington County (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: High Wind Warning issued November 19 at 3:57AM MST until November 20 at 11:00AM MST by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 5 PM THIS AFTERNOON TO 11 AM MST MONDAY... * WHAT...North to northeast winds 25 to 35 mph with gusts up to 60 mph expected. * WHERE...Lower Washington County. * WHEN...From 5 PM this afternoon to 11 AM MST Monday. * IMPACTS...High winds may move loose debris, damage property and cause power outages. Travel will be difficult due to crosswinds, especially for high profile vehicles and vehicles with trailers. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...For those in the highest threat area, ensure any potential projectiles such as trampolines, outdoor furniture, garbage cans, and holiday decorations are properly secured prior to Sunday afternoon to avoid property damage.
info.instruction: People are urged to secure loose objects that could be blown around or damaged by the wind.
